Here is the text:
Human aging is a process where people grow older and their bodies change. As people age, their cells get older and their bodies start to slow down. This is because the cells in our bodies have a limited number of times they can divide and make new cells.

Imagine a row of dominoes. Each domino represents a cell. When a cell divides, it's like knocking over a domino. Eventually, all the dominoes will fall, and there won't be any left to knock over. This is why our bodies can't keep making new cells forever.
